text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Ayabe! Are you going stargazing 
again tonight?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I found a wonderful candle lantern! It's
super cute and shaped like a heart! I've
been wanting to use it, so is it okay if
I join you?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
…… Top Road. 
I'm fine, you don't need to mind me.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I like being alone, so really…… 
you don't have to.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
No, let me care about you. 
You're my beloved classmate ——

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
And my super precious rival! 
I won't let you be alone!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
…… That candle lantern's probably going 
to go out quickly if you use it outside. 
Curren bought the same one…… and she 
said that was the case.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I think she'll let you borrow a
different one… if you don't mind it
being star shaped.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
! ……Thank you so much! 
I'll come to your room tonight then!
